title: Home
description: an innovative solution for your osu! projects.

about.title: About CircleForms
about.first: CircleForms is an alternative to Google Forms, designed for osu!-related projects with convenience in mind, allowing easier registration for tournaments and much more.
about.second: This project is non-profit and is not associated with osu!. It is something we created in our free time, for the osu! community.

recentForms.title: Recently created forms
recentForms.description: See the latest projects from the community hosts!

noForms: No forms here. Come back later!
